commit message:
- Reduced amount of Lint warnings
- Fixed NPEs and other bugs
- Removed AbstractCache since we hardly used anything from there
- Updated implementation of AsyncTask
- Fixed possible memory leak in UpdateController
Fixed NPE when fragment was detached before our background sync was finished
Attempt to fix 'NoClassDefFoundError: android.support.v7.internal.view.menu.MenuBuilder' as described here: http://stackoverflow.com/a/26641388
2nd Attempt to fix 'NoClassDefFoundError: android.support.v7.internal.view.menu.MenuBuilder' as described here: http://stackoverflow.com/a/26641388

* Fixed problem with Samsung devices running Android 4.2.2
* Fixed FCs
